decks.notes: The deck focuses on assembling the Broodscale Bloodchief combo, using cards like Basking Broodscale and Blade of the Bloodchief to generate huge amounts of value and overwhelm the opponent. It includes cards like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategy while ramping into powerful threats like Emrakul, the Promised End. The deck also utilizes cards like Urza's Saga and Eldrazi Temple to quickly ramp and assemble its combo pieces. Overall, the key concept of the deck is to efficiently combo off and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and disruptive spells.

This deck focuses on aggressively disrupting your opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient creatures. By using cards like Fatal Push, Thoughtseize, and Prismatic Ending to control the board and disrupt their strategy, you can clear the way for your aggressive creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Emperor of Bones to quickly close out the game. The deck also utilizes flicker effects like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to gain additional value from your creatures and disrupt your opponent's board state.

The focus of this deck is to control the board through counterspells and removal spells, while utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler to slow down the opponent. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to quickly close out the game. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements, allowing for consistent access to the spells needed to maintain control of the game. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through attrition and strategic plays.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan with counterspells and removal spells, while also applying pressure with quick and efficient creatures. Utilizing flash creatures like Brazen Borrower and Harbinger of the Seas, along with powerful spells like Stern Scolding and Force of Negation, the deck aims to control the board and tempo of the game. With a mix of disruptive elements and card advantage engines like Fblthp, the Lost and Coiling Oracle, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory through aggressive play.

This deck focuses on using a variety of creatures to assemble powerful combos and generate value through sacrificing and proliferating. The key strength lies in the toolbox nature of the creatures, allowing for flexibility in different game situations. By utilizing Yawgmoth, Thran Physician's abilities in combination with creatures like Hapatra, Vizier of Poisons and Walking Ballista, the deck can control the board and generate card advantage. Green Sun's Zenith and Chord of Calling provide additional tutor effects to search for key pieces, while cards like Spymaster's Vault and Malevolent Rumble offer additional synergy and disruption.
